page.title: 11THE MOTORWAYS.
page.content: The M5 Motorway is a vital link between the Midlands, London, South Wales and the West of England. In particular it has increased the popularity as a leading coastal resort of Weston-Super-Mare. Weston-Super-Mare has grown from a fashionable Victorian seaside resort into a lively modern holiday centre with a grand pier, luxurious hotels and other attractive amencities. The town also offers some fine recreational and cultural facilities for young,middle-aged and elderly.* Beyond the facilities the town can offer, are the famous attractions of the Avon and Somerset countryside including Cheddar Gorge,Wookey Hole and the Blagdon Lakes. * There are excellent restaurants, theatres,cinemas,golf courses and swimming pools.
